name: Snowstorm Cabin
description:
You are trapped inside cabin in the middle of the woods while in winter. Try your best to survive the night as the storm gets harsher all the while the sounds you hear in the woods is slowly eating up your sanity.

Instructions:

1. Hover mouse on door and click on the popup text to repair door.

2. Hover mouse on fireplace and click on popup text to add mode wood.

Daylight Hours added on wood collection round will increase wood collection time.

Daylight Hours added on reinforcement round will increase the red bars that can be hit.

3. On the Wood Collection Round, use arrow keys to navigate around the woods to collect wood.

4. During the Door Reinforcement Round, use Spacebar to stop the moving bar to stop on the red bars.
